channel.title: Armor help
channel.description:
My server doesnt have hp boosts on these armors/robes... my friend made the source i use and i do not know what base it was but im pretty sure it isnt PI... all i need to know is the snippit for the armor/robes hp boost and where to place it
Thanks in advance tompacman

torva, virtus, pernix

Sorry if I left out details
